item.description:
The Museum of Fine Arts do a special event on the first Friday of every month, including exhibition highlights, cocktails, tapas and live music. This will be a great opportunity to see some of the amazing collections and hang out afterwards for refreshments. The cost will be $15 per head, which covers entry into the museum and the First Friday event, food and beverages not included. This will be another joint event with the Boston Canadian meetup group.

So the plan is to meet at the main entrance on Huntington Ave between 6:30 and 6:45 PM. After that we can go our separate ways, have a wander through the museum and then reconvene at the Koch Gallery at 8:30pm to catch the last hour of the drinks, food and music. Depending on the vibe we may head out somewhere else nearby after the museum closes at around 9:30 PM.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: MFA First Friday
